alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Lackawanna; Luzerne; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 5:07PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Susquehanna, northwestern Lackawanna, Luzerne, southeastern Bradford and Wyoming Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 507 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Laceyville to Lightstreet. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilkes-Barre, Falls, Hazleton, Muhlenberg, Kingston, Nanticoke, Plains, Pittston, Plymouth and Exeter. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 80 between 256 and 262. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 143 and 170A and B, and near 211. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
